plays.text: Goal scored by MIKE PELUSO assisted by Alexander Karpovtsev and Boris Mironov
Penalty to Chris McAlpine 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)

Penalty to Boris Mironov 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Pavol Demitra 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Tony Amonte assisted by Steve Sullivan and Mark Bell
Goal scored by Mark Bell unassisted
